events.name: Golden Shrine
events.description: You encounter a golden shrine. It radiates power but demands a price.

choices.text: Pray at the shrine (Lose 25% Max HP, gain a random relic)

outcomes.text: You feel your life force drain away...
The shrine bestows a powerful relic upon you!
Gold coins spill from the shattered shrine!
You walk away from the shrine.

events.name: Mysterious Sphere
events.description: A floating sphere pulses with energy. Touch it?

outcomes.text: Warm energy flows through you!
Dark energy saps your strength!
The sphere transforms into gold!
You decide not to risk it.

events.name: Match and Keep!
events.description: A strange merchant offers you a game. Match the card, keep your money. Lose and pay the price!

outcomes.text: You pay the entry fee...
You won! Your card is upgraded!
You lost! The merchant cackles as pain shoots through you.
The merchant shrugs and disappears.

events.name: Wing Statue
events.description: A statue of a winged figure. You sense you could pray for aid or smash it for immediate gains.

choices.text: Pray for flight (Remove a card from your deck)

outcomes.text: The statue glows and a card lifts from your deck, dissolving into light.
The statue crumbles, revealing hidden gold!
You respectfully leave the statue intact.

events.name: Fountain of Cleansing
events.description: A pristine fountain offers purification at a price.

outcomes.text: The water burns going down...
A card dissolves from your deck.
Another card fades away.
The water stings slightly...
A card vanishes from your deck.
You leave the fountain untouched.

events.name: World of Goop
events.description: You're covered in sticky goop! It will slow you down unless you remove it.

outcomes.text: You scrape off the goop. Much better!

choices.text: Keep it (Your deck is now full of SLIMED cards)

outcomes.text: The goop seeps into your deck, adding Slimed cards!

events.name: The Cleric
events.description: A mysterious cleric offers healing... for a price.

outcomes.text: You pay the cleric...
The cleric's magic restores you completely!
You pay the cleric...
The cleric heals your wounds.
The cleric nods and continues on their way.

events.name: Scrap Ooze
events.description: A strange ooze offers to transform one of your cards into something better... or worse.

outcomes.text: The ooze absorbs your card and spits out a different one!
You back away slowly from the ooze.

events.name: Knowing Skull
events.description: An ancient skull speaks: 'I can show you secrets... if you dare.'

choices.text: Learn its secrets (Lose 6 HP, gain a rare card)

outcomes.text: Knowledge comes with pain...
The skull imparts forbidden knowledge!
The skull's eyes dim in disappointment.

events.name: Accursed Blacksmith
events.description: A blacksmith offers to forge your cards into something greater, but warns of a curse.

choices.text: Upgrade all Strike and Defend cards

outcomes.text: Your basic cards are reforged into superior versions!
But a curse seeps into your deck...
You politely decline the blacksmith's offer.

events.name: Vampires
events.description: Vampires offer you their power in exchange for your vitality.

choices.text: Accept their offer (Lose 30% Max HP, remove all Strike cards, gain 5 Bites)

outcomes.text: You feel weaker, but also... different.
Your Strike cards dissolve...
The vampires grant you Bite cards!
You reject their offer and leave quickly.

events.name: Dead Adventurer
events.description: You find the body of a fallen adventurer. Their belongings lie scattered.

outcomes.text: You find gold!
You find a potion!
You find a relic!
The body was cursed! A curse enters your deck.
You respectfully leave the adventurer undisturbed.

events.name: The Library
events.description: An ancient library full of knowledge. You could spend time studying...

choices.text: Study intensely (Lose 20% Max HP, gain 2 rare cards)

outcomes.text: The intense study exhausts you...
You master a powerful technique!
You learn another secret art!
You find useful notes that improve one of your techniques.
You don't have time for books right now.

events.name: Bonfire Spirits
events.description: Spirits dance around a bonfire. They beckon you to join them.

choices.text: Dance with the spirits (Upgrade all cards in your hand)

outcomes.text: The spirits enhance your techniques!
You watch the mesmerizing dance but don't participate.

events.name: The Lab
events.description: An abandoned laboratory. Potions bubble on workbenches.

outcomes.text: You pocket a mysterious potion.
You take another one for good measure.
One of your cards is altered by strange energies!
Another card undergoes a bizarre transformation!
This place gives you the creeps. You leave.

events.name: Shining Light
events.description: A beam of pure light descends from above. Its warmth is inviting.

choices.text: Step into the light (Upgrade 2 random cards)

outcomes.text: The light refines your abilities!
Your techniques are further enhanced!
You admire the light from a distance.

events.name: Mushrooms
events.description: Colorful mushrooms grow in a circle. They look... interesting.

outcomes.text: You feel amazing! Full health restored!
Bad idea. You feel sick.
Your body adapts! Max HP increased!
The mushrooms were cursed! Parasites infest your deck.
Probably wise.

events.name: Face Trader
events.description: A masked figure offers to trade faces with you. They claim it will make you stronger.

outcomes.text: Your identity shifts... a card changes!
Another aspect of you transforms!
You barely recognize yourself. Another card altered!
You like your face just the way it is.

events.name: The Beggar
events.description: A beggar asks for spare change.

outcomes.text: The beggar thanks you profusely...
They give you a strange trinket in return!
They shuffle away happily.
The beggar nods appreciatively.
You walk past without making eye contact.

events.name: Ancient Writing
events.description: Strange symbols are carved into the wall. They seem to pulse with power.

choices.text: Try to read them (Lose 10 HP, upgrade all Strike and Defend cards)

outcomes.text: The knowledge burns your mind...
But your basic techniques are refined!
Best not to meddle with ancient magic.

events.name: The Augmenter
events.description: A strange device offers to enhance your abilities permanently.

choices.text: Use the device (Gain 20 Max HP, add a Wound to your deck)

outcomes.text: You feel stronger!
But the procedure leaves you wounded...
You don't trust the device.

events.name: The Purifier
events.description: An ethereal being offers to purge your deck of weakness.

outcomes.text: A card is purged from your deck.
Another card dissolves away.
You decide to keep your deck as is.

events.name: The Nest
events.description: You discover a nest with glowing eggs. You could take one... or destroy the nest.

choices.text: Take an egg (Gain a random relic)

outcomes.text: The egg hatches into something useful!
You feel guilty, but the gold is nice.
You let nature take its course.
